comments:
Follow the instructions below to reproduce the problem:

- Import a log file
- In the log view -> Click on the Manage Filters.. button in the toolbar -> Select Manage Filters...
- Click on New
- Switch to the Advanced tab
- Add in two filters
- Select both filters and click on Remove.  Notice that neither one of the filters are removed.

I'm attaching Eclipse's log file

Here's part of the exception:

Eclipse's log file
This defect could be caused by the recent changes made for enhancement 147931
Guru, Please take a look at the problem. This seems to be regression from the new viewer framework introduced.
Added Alex and Pavel to the CC list.

Here's the proposed fix

This is hardly a bug introduced by the recent changes.
Nevertheless, this patch fixes the problem.
